edu.cuny.ai.learning
Class SoftmaxActionChoosingPolicy

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.ai.learning.ActionChoosingPolicy
      edu.cuny.ai.learning.SoftmaxActionChoosingPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
LearningPolicy, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class SoftmaxActionChoosingPolicy
extends ActionChoosingPolicy
implements Parameterizable

A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to update the expected returns of multiple discrete actions based on the softmax method in Section 2.3, Sutton and Barto's RL book

temperature is constant when alpha is 1, or reducing down to mintemperature when alpha is less than 1.

Parameters

base.temperature
double >=0 (0.2 by default)		 (the temperature controlling the probabilities actions are chosen)
base.mintemperature
double >=0 (0.01 by default)		 (the minimum value for temperature)
base.alpha
double (0,1] (1 by default)		 (the cooling rate of temperature over time)

Default Base

softmax_action_choosing

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Jinzhong Niu

Description copied from class: ActionChoosingPolicy

internalAct

protected int internalAct(double[] returns)
acts without updating temperature. This is useful when multiple acts are required in a row at a single step.

Parameters:
returns -
Returns:
the action chosen to take
